name: lectrote
description: The Quixe/GlkOte IF interpreter in an Electron shell

scripts.preinstall: if [ -f quixe/LICENSE ]; then echo Quixe already installed; elif [ -d .git ]; then git submodule init; git submodule update; else git clone https://github.com/erkyrath/quixe.git; fi
scripts.package-win32-ia32: electron-packager tempapp Lectrote --app-version $npm_package_version --build-version 1 --arch=ia32 --platform=win32 --out dist --version-string.CompanyName='Zarfhome Software' --app-copyright='Copyright 2016 by Andrew Plotkin' --version-string.InternalName='Lectrote.exe' --version-string.ProductName='Lectrote' --version-string.OriginalFilename='Lectrote.exe' --version-string.FileDescription='Interactive Fiction Interpreter' --icon=resources/appicon-win.ico --overwrite
scripts.package-win32-x64: electron-packager tempapp Lectrote --app-version $npm_package_version --build-version 1 --arch=x64 --platform=win32 --out dist --version-string.CompanyName='Zarfhome Software' --app-copyright='Copyright 2016 by Andrew Plotkin' --version-string.InternalName='Lectrote.exe' --version-string.ProductName='Lectrote' --version-string.OriginalFilename='Lectrote.exe' --version-string.FileDescription='Interactive Fiction Interpreter' --icon=resources/appicon-win.ico --overwrite

author: Andrew Plotkin <erkyrath@eblong.com>
